sentences.en: Before you fling off a remark like that, think what you're saying.
sentences.cn: 在你漫不经心地说这种话之前, 应先考虑考虑要说些什么.

sentences.en: Don't fling your arms and legs around like that. Make the proper swimming strokes.
sentences.cn: 别这样乱划乱蹬,要采用正确的游泳姿势.

sentences.en: Don't fling your clothes into the drawer, put them in neatly.
sentences.cn: 不要把你的衣服随便往抽屉里一扔, 把它们整齐地放在里面.

sentences.en: Fling back the ball to me.
He flung his coat over the back of a chair.
He flung the box into the river.
He had his fling when he was young; now he must work.
sentences.cn: 他年轻时恣情纵欲, 现在必须干活了.

sentences.en: He was pleased to be able to fling off such an unwelcome responsibility.
sentences.cn: 能摆脱如此令人厌烦的责任他感到很高兴.

sentences.en: I can fling off a poem in half an hour.
sentences.cn: 我用半小时就可以作一首诗.

sentences.en: I really must fling out all these old newspapers.
sentences.cn: 我真的该把这些旧报纸扔掉了.

sentences.en: I wasn't able to fling a word into the argument the whole time.
sentences.cn: 在整个辩论过程中,我没能插进一句话.

sentences.en: If you buy the furniture, the store will fling in a television set.
sentences.cn: 如果你想买家具, 商店会赠送你一台电视机.

sentences.en: It's good to fling off heavy clothing now that spring is here.
sentences.cn: 春天到了,脱去笨重的冬装真让人高兴.

sentences.en: Let's have a fling and eat at that expensive restaurant for a change.
sentences.cn: 咱们痛快一下,到那间高级餐馆吃一顿换换口味.

sentences.en: People cheered and flung their hats into the air.
sentences.cn: 民众欢呼着把帽子抛向空中。

sentences.en: The criminal tried to fling off the police.
sentences.cn: 那个罪犯企图甩掉追捕他的警察.

sentences.en: The criminals tried to fling off the police, but failed and were caught.
sentences.cn: 罪犯企图摆脱警察, 但是没成功,被抓获了.

sentences.en: There was no need to fling in that rude remark.
sentences.cn: 插那么一句无礼的话真没必要.

trans.tran_en: a short period of time during which you enjoy yourself without worrying about anything
